description.zh: 在线代码格式化工具，支持多种编程语言的代码美化和格式化，让你的代码更加整洁易读。
description.en: Online code formatting tool that supports code beautification and formatting for multiple programming languages, making your code cleaner and more readable.

description.zh: 快速生成各种类型的二维码，支持文本、链接、WiFi等多种内容格式。
description.en: Quickly generate various types of QR codes with support for text, links, WiFi and other content formats.
